# Introduction to matplotlib


## Introduction

The ability to produce visualizations is helpful when presenting summaries of large datasets to others who may not have the time to analyze them.
One library that can be used is the matplotlib library. It provides a variety of plots to choose in order to efficiently present data.
A progression of graphs will be used to demonstrate basic functions users can find to customize their graphs.


## How to Install

Matplotlib is not a default package and therefore must be installed via pip or Anaconda.

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# do something
```
